name: sweet dough
description:
sweet dough is a twine game that teaches you how to bake and learn from your mistakes. it's an interactive fiction about queerness, iced buns, steven universe and bbc radio 4. this game is free to download (name your own price) and was made in 2 days for the #letscookjam.

sweet dough v2.0 — including better visuals — is currently in progress!
